thread.title: Canada's Offsetters acquires European assets, plans rebranding
thread.title_full: Canada's Offsetters acquires European assets, plans rebranding

title: Canada's Offsetters acquires European assets, plans rebranding
text:
End date Canada's Offsetters acquires European assets, plans rebranding 
Offsetters Climate Solutions of Canada has acquired several assets from Forest Finance Service of Germany that it says will strengthen its position in the market for carbon offsets and ecosystem services. To access this article please sign-in below or register for a free one-month trial. Login
